group.title: Fancy RecyclerView
group.description: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for some known platforms.
group.shortDescription: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView.

extensions.name: Fancy RecyclerView 2
extensions.description: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for Kodular.
extensions.shortDescription: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for Kodular.

groups.title: Fancy RecyclerView Widgets
groups.description: This extension contains a set of components that can be added when creating a RecyclerView.
